Driver ID: TPTP-4.2.0-200604040100

Testsuite: Platform.UI.Example.ISV

1) Create the sample: File > New > Example > UI > ExportViewerGeneratorSample
2) Launch an instance of a runtime workbench by selecting Run > Run As > Eclipse Application. 
3) In the runtime workbench, switch to the Profiling Monitor navigator view in the Profiling perspective. Populate the Profiling Monitor view by importing a profiling file or profiling an application. 
4)Open any TPTP profiling statistical view, e.g. Memory Statistic view, Execution Statistic view. 
There is no "Export to XML" option.

add a try/catch on the HyadesReportWizard to ignore extensions that are not found
the BIRT report extension point are throwing exception which fails the report wizard creation

org.eclipse.tptp.platform.report.birt_4.2.0.v200604050100.jar does not contain the classes of the plugin which fails the loading of all BIRT reports.

src folder is not included in build.properties file.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 135132 ***
*** Bug 135208 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
